snippet: Michael J. Simermeyer, who died when a crane fell on him at the No. 7 subway work site on Tuesday, was good with his hands, his family said.
abstract: Family of Michael J Simermeyer, who died in collapse of crane at the No. 7 subway work site in Manhattan, says he was drawn into the family business, coming from a long line of construction workers.
lead_paragraph: Michael J. Simermeyer, who died when a crane fell on him at the No. 7 subway work site on Tuesday, was good with his hands, his family said.

headline.seo: Recalling a Worker Who Entered the Family Trade
headline.main: A Fallen Worker Had Proudly Joined the Family Trade
headline.print_headline: A Fallen Worker Had Proudly Joined the Family Trade
